name: 8-Bit Slasher 4-in-1 Horror Demakes
description:
Information:
Back in the late 90s/early 00s I made 4 slasher fan games for the PC. Friday the 13th: Return to Camp Blood, Halloween: October: 31st, A Nightmare on Elm Street: Son of a Hundred Maniacs, and Candyman: Be My Victim. Fast forward to 2023 and I demade all of them as NES roms. A childhood dream come true. This program is for people that don't want to go through the hassle of messing with emulators and having the games in one little neat package to play on your PC instead. For more information on each individual game, please visit the links below:

  • Friday the 13th: Return to Camp Blood - PC Version - NES Demake
  • Halloween: October: 31st - PC Version - NES Demake
  • A Nightmare on Elm Street: Son of a Hundred Maniacs - PC Version - NES Demake
  • Candyman: Be My Victim - PC Version - NES Demake

Menu Instructions:
Use your mouse to select which NES demake you'd like to play.  While playing the game press escape to access your controller setup and screen settings.

Game Controls:
Directional pad to move.
B or A to attack.

All games are created by Steve McCall. They're FREE and NOT to be sold. Thanks to all that helped!

Special thanks to Christopher F. Arnold (Kurisama91) for creating this windows program and putting it all together for me. You rule!
